Articles.Content:
Hey all.

I'm kina new to KSP, and I just recently found these forums. The first thing I noticed were all of these epic space stations and ships, and they had links, so that I could get them. All of them were in .craft files. My question is this: If I have the demo, do I need to get the bought versions to get these ships? If not, then how do I insert them? I put them in my "Ships" file, but when I open that file up in-game, it's empty.

Thanks buches!

Sneeze

File compatibility was broken at least once since 0.13 (I'm speaking of .craft compatibility only), due to the added parts and other changes. So my guess is that you cannot get them to work in the demo.

Yeah, Just shell out the cash and buy the full version. You'll love yourself for it.

EVA's, craft files, new planet, tons of new parts, even more planets being added, It's money well spent.

Welcome aboard though.

Arrrrr....

Capt'n Millst0ne
M'k then. I guess its a good thing Im getting the bought version today... thanks a lot!
No problem, Feel free to ask if you have any more questions. I'm sure someone will be more than happy to help out. Have fun building rockets!
